kit.leader_skill: "Mission Execution" or "Earth-Bred Fighters" Category Ki +3, HP +200% and ATK & DEF +170%, plus an additional HP, ATK & DEF +50% for characters who also belong to the "Dragon Ball Seekers" or "Earthlings" Category

super_attack.name: Crane School Assassin Strike
super_attack.effect: Massively raises ATK for 1 turn,; causes immense damage to enemy; and lowers ATK & DEF

passive_skill.name: A Professional's Style
passive_skill.effect: Activates the Entrance Animation when there is another "Mission Execution" Category ally on the team upon the character's entry: (Once) Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type (PHY excluded) to Rainbow Ki Spheres and stuns all enemies for 1 turn; (Once) ATK 100% up and chance of performing a critical hit & damage reduction rate 50% up; (Once) Ki +2 and ATK & DEF 200% up; (Once) Damage reduction rate 30% up; (Once) Medium chance of performing a critical hit; When attacking with 12 or more Ki: ATK 200% up; For every Rainbow Ki Sphere obtained: ATK 200% up when attacking; When receiving an attack: DEF 200% up; When receiving an Unarmed Super Attack: Great chance of nullifying it and countering with tremendous power; When the target enemy is in the following status:: ATK 500% up; Performs a critical hit; ATK 500% up when HP is 70% or less

active_skill.name: Serious Dodon Ray
active_skill.effect: Causes ultimate damage; Stuns the enemy for 1 turn; Changes STR & INT Ki Spheres; to Rainbow Ki Spheres
active_skill.activation_conditions: Can be activated when there is a "Dragon Ball Seekers" or "Kamehameha" Category enemy Or when all allies attacking in the same turn are "Mission Execution" Category characters (once only)
